rows.label: tev000695_MSG0001
rows.name:
What're you doing here, [ST:playername ]?
Got the day off or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000695_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what Frye is doing.

rows.label: tev000695_JNK0020
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: tev000695_SEL0021
rows.name: Admit that you came here to see Frye.

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0002
rows.name:
I know it ain't my style, but I was just spending a little
time with my thoughts. ...Sober, even.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0003
rows.name: I appreciate that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hey, so since you're here, will you hear me out on
something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0005
rows.name: Sometimes I just can't stop thinking about Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0006
rows.name:
Like how I used to walk through a weird jumble of
downtown shops before ducking down this one specific
back alley...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0007
rows.name:
And then? Boom! The best dive bar in the whole damn
city, where I knew everybody, and they all knew me!
Man, did we ever have some laughs...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0008
rows.name: But I guess they're all gone now, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0009
rows.name:
Anyway, this planet ain't so bad, but it's hard not to
think about home sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0010
rows.name:
I understand that no amount of thinking about Earth is
gonna change what happened to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0011
rows.name:
But if the Earth was still around somehow...?
Well, that's a fantasy I just can't let go of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0012
rows.name:
So how am I supposed to get it out of my head, huh?
How do I forget it? You gotta tell me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev000695_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Frye to drink until the pain goes away.

rows.label: tev000695_JNK0040
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: tev000695_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Frye that drinking more is all you can think of.

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0013
rows.name: Exactly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0014
rows.name:
On days like this, I can never seem to get drunkâ€”
but it's still the only way I can get myself going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0015
rows.name: I'll drink beer after beer, just like you recommended.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0016
rows.name: I'll drink cocktail after cocktail, just like you suggested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'll drink one glass of wine after another,
just like you recommended.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0018
rows.name: I'll drink vodka after vodka, just like you suggested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'll drink one cup of sake after another,
just like you suggested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'll drink my favorite Scotch till I'm practically drowning
in the stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0021
rows.name:
Tonight I'm gonna drink till morning with Phog and a
bunch of Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0022
rows.name:
Then tomorrow I'll go kill a tyrant in between heated
battles with my hangover.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Just like I do pretty much every day of my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0024
rows.name: But maybe that's what I need right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000695_MSG0025
rows.name:
Anyway, thanks for listening. If you get the night off,
you should come with us![ST:wait ]
